ingredientsList.title: Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (APIs)
ingredientsList.desc: These are the biologically active compounds responsible for the therapeutic effect of the medicine.

ingredientsList.title: Herbs and Plant Extracts
ingredientsList.desc: Naturally derived extracts used for their medicinal properties, often included in traditional or complementary therapies.

ingredientsList.title: Excipients
ingredientsList.desc: Inactive substances used as carriers or stabilizers for the active ingredients, ensuring proper dosage and stability.

ingredientsList.title: Vitamins and Minerals
ingredientsList.desc: Essential micronutrients added to support overall health and enhance the effectiveness of the formulation.
